description: A woman about 30 to 40 years old, heavily made-up, with a disturbingly wide smile

npcTexts: Oh! Are you the new night guard?
Keep your eyes open tonight… at my circus, someone once lost an entire… fake head!
Hahaha, just kidding, don’t look at me like that!
Just moved in last week, but I already know every creak in these halls.
At night it feels like the building is breathing… like a giant beast, you know?
Oh, I’m just talking nonsense, it’s not real!
I’m a comedian… no, a circus performer!
Sometimes I even play a man-eating impostor.
Don’t worry, I’ve never… eaten anyone for real.

options.playerText: Have you met anyone strange here?
npcTexts: Hmm… last night I saw someone standing outside my door for an hour.
But when I opened it… no one was there.
If you hear laughter in the hall tonight… that’s probably just me.
Or… maybe someone else. Hehe, sleep well!
Oh, hello night guard!
Do you know what I dreamed of yesterday?
I dreamed everyone here looked exactly the same hahaha
I told you, just over a week. Or… was it two?
Oh, my memory is always a mess.
At the circus I even forgot my own birthday once!

options.playerText: Do you often go out at night?
npcTexts: Of course! Night is when the stage lights are most beautiful.
I work at the circus, after all.

options.playerText: Have you met anyone strange here?
npcTexts: Hmm, no one strange. Everyone here feels familiar.
But if someone new comes, maybe they just want to see the circus hahaha
If you hear applause tonight, remember to clap back.
At the circus, that’s basic manners.
Oh, doing well today?
Last night I had that same dream again.
Everyone looked alike and I had to tell them apart by their voices.
Comfortable?
Well, I’ve been here not even two weeks yet.
But for me, anywhere can be comfortable.

options.playerText: Do you have many friends here?
npcTexts: Of course! Everyone smiles at me.
But the smiles are stiff… like statues.
Everyone looks suspicious if you stare long enough.
But if you stare at me too long… you might find me suspicious too.
Haha, try it!
Enjoy your shift.
And remember… if someone knocks three times, don’t open. Unless it’s me, of course!
Hello! Don’t panic, I just… look a little different today.
In the circus, we change appearances all the time.
But I swear, this isn’t makeup… at least not today.
Alright! Just… sleeping less.
Sometimes I crave a little raw meat.
And you’re looking pretty tasty right now…

options.playerText: Do you remember what you told me?
npcTexts: Hmm… what did I say? Oh yes, I mentioned the knocking and the dreams.
But those were just stories I made up to tease you.

options.playerText: Do you have any advice for me?
npcTexts: Always keep smiling.
Like me—I can’t stop smiling at all.
Haha, give it a try!
If you see me standing at the end of the hall tonight… don’t come closer.
It’ll be a great circus act.
